title: 179 -  The Whiskey Rebellion
itunes:title: 179 -  The Whiskey Rebellion
description:
Comedians Dave Anthony and Gareth Reynolds examine Alexander Hamilton and George Washington's Whiskey Tax and the not so great reception to it on the frontier.
